titlestmt.titleproper: Finding Aid to the Jane P. Metzger, Class of 1941 letters CA.MS.0001
titlestmt.author: Kathleen Banks Nutter

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on 2018-12-18 11:21:48 -0500.

did.unittitle: Jane P. Metzger, Class of 1941 letters
did.abstract: Letters written by Metzger to her parents as a student at Smith College, 1937-1941, as well as a Smith College newspaper from 1940 and a reunion "yellow pages" from 1966.

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: This collection is open for use without restriction beyond the standard terms and conditions of Smith College Special Collections.

acqinfo.head: Immediate Source of Acquisition
acqinfo.p: Letters were donated by her son, Johathan Schilling in 2018.

processinfo.head: Processing Information
processinfo.p: Letters were removed from envelopes, dated if necessary, and ordered chronologically.

userestrict.head: Conditions Governing Use
userestrict.p: To the extent that he owns copyright,Johathan Schilling has assigned the copyright in his mother's works to Smith College; however, copyright in other items in this collection may be held by their respective creators. For reproductions of materials that are governed by fair use as defined under U. S. Copyright Law, no permission to cite or publish is required. For instances which may regard materials in the collection not created by Jane P. Metzger, researchers are responsible for determining who may hold materials' copyrights and obtaining approval from them. Researchers do not need anything further from Smith College Special Collections to move forward with their use.
